entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 24.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the evening then light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
